papers.title: Sigma Protocols for MQ, PKP and SIS, and Fishy Signature Schemes
papers.authors: Ward Beullens
papers.abstract: . This work presents sigma protocols to prove knowledge of: – a solution to a system of quadratic polynomials, – a solution to an instance of the Permuted Kernel Problem and – a witness for a variety of lattice statements (including SIS). Our sigma protocols have soundness error 1 /q (cid:48) , where q (cid:48) is any number bounded by the size of the underlying ﬁnite ﬁeld. This is much better than existing proofs, which have soundness error 2 / 3 or ( q (cid:48) +1) / 2 q (cid:48) . The prover and veriﬁer time our proofs are O ( q (cid:48) ). We achieve this by ﬁrst con-structing so-called sigma protocols with helper , which are sigma protocols where the prover and the veriﬁer are assisted by a trusted third party, and then eliminating the helper from the proof with a “cut-and-choose” protocol. We apply the Fiat-Shamir transform to obtain signature schemes with security proof in the QROM. We show that the resulting signature schemes, which we call the “MUltivariate quaDratic FIat-SHamir” scheme (MUDFISH) and the “ShUﬄed Solution to Homogeneous linear SYstem FIat-SHamir” scheme (SUSHSYFISH), are more eﬃcient than existing signatures based on the MQ problem and the Permuted Kernel Problem. Our proof system can be used to improve the eﬃciency of applications relying on (generalizations of) Stern’s protocol. We show that the proof size of our SIS proof is smaller than that of Stern’s protocol by an order of magnitude and that our proof is more eﬃcient than existing post-quantum secure SIS proofs.
papers.abstract_zh: 。这项工作提出了西格玛协议，以证明知识:–一个二次多项式系统的解决方案，–一个置换核问题的实例的解决方案，以及–各种格语句(包括SIS)的见证。我们的sigma协议的可靠性误差为1 /q (cid:48)，其中q (cid:48)是由基础有限场大小限定的任何数字。这比现有的证明好得多，现有的证明具有2 / 3或(q (cid:48) +1) / 2 q (cid:48)的可靠性误差。我们的证明是O ( q (cid:48))。我们通过首先构建所谓的带助手的sigma协议来实现这一点，这是一种sigma协议，其中证明者和验证者由可信的第三方协助，然后通过“切割选择”协议从证明中消除助手。我们应用Fiat-Shamir变换在QROM中获得具有安全证明的签名方案。我们证明了由此产生的签名方案，我们称之为“多元二次菲亚特-沙米尔”方案(MUDFISH)和“齐次线性系统菲亚特-沙米尔的ShUﬄed解”方案(SUSHSYFISH)，比现有的基于MQ问题和置换核问题的签名更eﬃcient。我们的证明系统可用于提高依赖于Stern协议(的推广)的应用的eﬃciency。我们证明了我们的SIS证明的证明规模比Stern协议的证明规模小一个数量级，并且我们的证明比现有的后量子安全SIS证明更具eﬃcient性。

papers.title: Non-uniformity and Quantum Advice in the Quantum Random Oracle Model
papers.authors: Qipeng Liu
papers.abstract: QROM (quantum random oracle model), introduced by Boneh et al. (Asiacrypt 2011), captures all generic algorithms. However, it fails to describe non-uniform quantum algorithms with preprocessing power, which receives a piece of bounded classical or quantum advice. As non-uniform algorithms are largely believed to be the right model for attackers, starting from the work by Nayebi, Aaronson, Belovs, and Trevisan (QIC 2015), a line of works investigates non-uniform security in the random oracle model. Chung, Guo, Liu, and Qian (FOCS 2020) provide a framework and establish non-uniform security for many cryptographic applications. In this work, we continue the study on quantum advice in the QROM. We provide a new idea that generalizes the previous multi-instance framework, which we believe is more quantum-friendly and should be the quantum analogue of multi-instance games. To this end, we match the bounds with quantum advice to those with classical advice by Chung et al., showing quantum advice is almost as good/bad as classical advice for many natural security games in the QROM. Finally, we show that for some contrived games in the QROM, quantum advice can be exponentially better than classical advice for some parameter regimes. To our best knowledge, it provides some evidence of a general separation between quantum and classical advice relative to an unstructured oracle.
papers.abstract_zh: 由Boneh等人(Asiacrypt 2011)引入的QROM(量子随机预言模型)捕获了所有通用算法。然而，它未能描述具有预处理能力的非均匀量子算法，该算法接收一条有界的经典或量子建议。由于非一致算法在很大程度上被认为是攻击者的正确模型，从纳耶比、阿伦森、别洛夫斯和特雷维桑(QIC 2015)的工作开始，一系列工作研究了随机预言模型中的非一致安全性。Chung、郭、刘和钱(2020)为许多密码应用提供了一个框架并建立了非统一的安全性。在本工作中，我们继续研究QROM中的量子建议。我们提供了一个新的想法，概括了以前的多实例框架，我们认为它更加量子友好，应该是多实例游戏的量子模拟。为此，我们将量子建议的界限与Chung等人的经典建议的界限进行匹配，表明对于QROM中的许多自然安全游戏，量子建议几乎与经典建议一样好/坏。最后，我们证明了对于QROM中的一些人为的游戏，量子建议在某些参数范围内比经典建议要好得多。据我们所知，它提供了一些证据，表明相对于非结构化的预言，量子建议和经典建议之间存在普遍的分离。
papers.title_zh: 量子随机预言模型中的非一致性和量子建议

papers.title: A New Framework for Quantum Oblivious Transfer
papers.authors: Amit Agarwal, James Bartusek, Dakshita Khurana, Nishant Kumar
papers.abstract: We present a new template for building oblivious transfer from quantum information that we call the"fixed basis"framework. Our framework departs from prior work (eg., Crepeau and Kilian, FOCS '88) by fixing the correct choice of measurement basis used by each player, except for some hidden trap qubits that are intentionally measured in a conjugate basis. We instantiate this template in the quantum random oracle model (QROM) to obtain simple protocols that implement, with security against malicious adversaries: 1. Non-interactive random-input bit OT in a model where parties share EPR pairs a priori. 2. Two-round random-input bit OT without setup, obtained by showing that the protocol above remains secure even if the (potentially malicious) OT receiver sets up the EPR pairs. 3. Three-round chosen-input string OT from BB84 states without entanglement or setup. This improves upon natural variations of the CK88 template that require at least five rounds. Along the way, we develop technical tools that may be of independent interest. We prove that natural functions like XOR enable seedless randomness extraction from certain quantum sources of entropy. We also use idealized (i.e. extractable and equivocal) bit commitments, which we obtain by proving security of simple and efficient constructions in the QROM.
papers.abstract_zh: 我们提出了一个新的模板来构建量子信息的不经意传输，我们称之为“固定基础”框架。我们的框架从先前的工作(例如，克雷波和基利安，FOCS '88)出发，通过确定每个参与者使用的测量基的正确选择，除了一些隐藏的陷阱量子位，它们被有意地在共轭基中测量。我们在量子随机预言模型(QROM)中实例化该模板，以获得简单的协议，该协议实现了针对恶意对手的安全性:1 .在各方先验共享EPR对的模型中的非交互随机输入位OT。2.无需设置的两轮随机输入比特OT，通过表明即使(潜在恶意的)OT接收者设置EPR对，上述协议仍然是安全的而获得。3.来自BB84态的三轮选择输入串OT，没有纠缠或设置。这改进了CK88模板的自然变化，其需要至少五轮。在这一过程中，我们开发了可能独立感兴趣的技术工具。我们证明了像XOR这样的自然函数能够从熵的某些量子源中提取无籽随机性。我们还使用理想化的(即可提取的和不明确的)位承诺，这是通过证明QROM中简单有效的构造的安全性而获得的。
papers.title_zh: 一个新的量子不经意传输框架

papers.title: Public Key Encryption with Secure Key Leasing
papers.authors: Shweta Agrawal, Fuyuki Kitagawa, Ryo Nishimaki, Shota Yamada, Takashi Yamakawa
papers.abstract: We introduce the notion of public key encryption with secure key leasing (PKE-SKL). Our notion supports the leasing of decryption keys so that a leased key achieves the decryption functionality but comes with the guarantee that if the quantum decryption key returned by a user passes a validity test, then the user has lost the ability to decrypt. Our notion is similar in spirit to the notion of secure software leasing (SSL) introduced by Ananth and La Placa (Eurocrypt 2021) but captures significantly more general adversarial strategies. In more detail, our adversary is not restricted to use an honest evaluation algorithm to run pirated software. Our results can be summarized as follows: 1. Definitions: We introduce the definition of PKE with secure key leasing and formalize security notions. 2. Constructing PKE with Secure Key Leasing: We provide a construction of PKE-SKL by leveraging a PKE scheme that satisfies a new security notion that we call consistent or inconsistent security against key leasing attacks (CoIC-KLA security). We then construct a CoIC-KLA secure PKE scheme using 1-key Ciphertext-Policy Functional Encryption (CPFE) that in turn can be based on any IND-CPA secure PKE scheme. 3. Identity Based Encryption, Attribute Based Encryption and Functional Encryption with Secure Key Leasing: We provide definitions of secure key leasing in the context of advanced encryption schemes such as identity based encryption (IBE), attribute-based encryption (ABE) and functional encryption (FE). Then we provide constructions by combining the above PKE-SKL with standard IBE, ABE and FE schemes.
papers.abstract_zh: 我们引入了安全密钥租赁的公钥加密的概念(PKE-SKL)。我们的概念支持解密密钥的租借，因此租借的密钥实现解密功能，但是附带保证，如果用户返回的量子解密密钥通过有效性测试，则用户已经失去解密的能力。我们的概念在精神上类似于由Ananth和La Placa (Eurocrypt 2021)引入的安全软件租赁(SSL)的概念，但是捕获了更一般的对抗策略。更详细地说，我们的对手不限于使用诚实的评估算法来运行盗版软件。我们的研究结果可以概括如下:1 .定义:我们引入了安全密钥租赁的PKE的定义，并形式化了安全概念。2.用安全的密钥租借来构造PKE:我们通过利用PKE方案来提供PKE-SKL的构造，该方案满足一种新的安全概念，我们称之为针对密钥租借攻击的一致或不一致安全性(CoIC-KLA安全性)。然后，我们使用1密钥密文策略函数加密(CPFE)构造了一个CoIC-KLA安全PKE方案，该方案可以基于任何IND-CPA安全PKE方案。3.基于身份的加密、基于属性的加密和具有安全密钥租赁的功能加密:我们在高级加密方案的上下文中提供安全密钥租赁的定义，如基于身份的加密(IBE)、基于属性的加密(ABE)和功能加密(FE)。然后，我们通过将上述PKE-SKL与标准的IBE、ABE和FE格式相结合来提供构造。
papers.title_zh: 具有安全密钥租赁的公钥加密

papers.title: Another Round of Breaking and Making Quantum Money: - How to Not Build It from Lattices, and More
papers.authors: Jiahui Liu, Hart Montgomery, Mark Zhandry
papers.abstract: Public verification of quantum money has been one of the central objects in quantum cryptography ever since Wiesner's pioneering idea of using quantum mechanics to construct banknotes against counterfeiting. So far, we do not know any publicly-verifiable quantum money scheme that is provably secure from standard assumptions. In this work, we provide both negative and positive results for publicly verifiable quantum money. **In the first part, we give a general theorem, showing that a certain natural class of quantum money schemes from lattices cannot be secure. We use this theorem to break the recent quantum money scheme of Khesin, Lu, and Shor. **In the second part, we propose a framework for building quantum money and quantum lightning we call invariant money which abstracts some of the ideas of quantum money from knots by Farhi et al.(ITCS'12). In addition to formalizing this framework, we provide concrete hard computational problems loosely inspired by classical knowledge-of-exponent assumptions, whose hardness would imply the security of quantum lightning, a strengthening of quantum money where not even the bank can duplicate banknotes. **We discuss potential instantiations of our framework, including an oracle construction using cryptographic group actions and instantiations from rerandomizable functional encryption, isogenies over elliptic curves, and knots.
papers.abstract_zh: 自从威斯纳开创性地使用量子力学来构造防伪钞票以来，量子货币的公开验证一直是量子密码术的中心目标之一。到目前为止，我们还不知道任何可公开验证的量子货币方案是可证明安全的。在这项工作中，我们为可公开验证的量子货币提供了正反两方面的结果。* *在第一部分中，我们给出了一个一般定理，证明了来自格的某个自然类的量子货币方案是不安全的。我们用这个定理来破解Khesin，Lu和Shor最近的量子货币方案。* *在第二部分，我们提出了一个构建量子货币和量子闪电的框架，我们称之为不变货币，它从Farhi等人(ITCS 12)的结中抽象出量子货币的一些思想。除了形式化这个框架之外，我们还提供了具体的硬计算问题，这些问题大致受经典指数知识假设的启发，其硬度意味着量子闪电的安全性，这是一种量子货币的强化，甚至银行都无法复制钞票。* *我们讨论了我们框架的潜在实例，包括使用加密组操作的oracle构造和来自可随机函数加密、椭圆曲线上的同源和结的实例。
papers.title_zh: 另一轮打破和制造量子货币:-如何不从格子中建立它，等等

papers.title: From the Hardness of Detecting Superpositions to Cryptography: Quantum Public Key Encryption and Commitments
papers.authors: Minki Hhan, Tomoyuki Morimae, Takashi Yamakawa
papers.abstract: Recently, Aaronson et al. (arXiv:2009.07450) showed that detecting interference between two orthogonal states is as hard as swapping these states. While their original motivation was from quantum gravity, we show its applications in quantum cryptography. 1. We construct the first public key encryption scheme from cryptographic \emph{non-abelian} group actions. Interestingly, the ciphertexts of our scheme are quantum even if messages are classical. This resolves an open question posed by Ji et al. (TCC '19). We construct the scheme through a new abstraction called swap-trapdoor function pairs, which may be of independent interest. 2. We give a simple and efficient compiler that converts the flavor of quantum bit commitments. More precisely, for any prefix X,Y $\in$ {computationally,statistically,perfectly}, if the base scheme is X-hiding and Y-binding, then the resulting scheme is Y-hiding and X-binding. Our compiler calls the base scheme only once. Previously, all known compilers call the base schemes polynomially many times (Cr\'epeau et al., Eurocrypt '01 and Yan, Asiacrypt '22). For the security proof of the conversion, we generalize the result of Aaronson et al. by considering quantum auxiliary inputs.
papers.abstract_zh: 最近，Aaronson等人(arXiv:2009.07450)表明，检测两个正交状态之间的干扰与交换这些状态一样困难。虽然他们最初的动机是来自量子引力，但我们展示了它在量子密码术中的应用。1.我们从密码群作用构造了第一个公钥加密方案。有趣的是，即使消息是经典的，我们方案的密文也是量子的。这解决了Ji等人提出的一个公开问题(TCC '19)。我们通过一种称为交换陷门函数对的新抽象来构造方案，这种抽象可能是独立的。2.我们给出了一个简单有效的编译器来转换量子比特承诺的味道。更准确地说，对于$ {计算地，统计地，完美地}中的任何前缀X，Y $ \来说，如果基础方案是X隐藏和Y绑定，那么结果方案是Y隐藏和X绑定。我们的编译器只调用一次基本方案。以前，所有已知的编译器多次多项式调用基方案(Cr\'epeau等人，Eurocrypt '01和Yan，Asiacrypt '22)。对于转换的安全性证明，我们通过考虑量子辅助输入推广了Aaronson等人的结果。

papers.title: Just How Hard Are Rotations of $\mathbb {Z}^n$? Algorithms and Cryptography with the Simplest Lattice
papers.authors: Huck Bennett, Atul Ganju, Pura Peetathawatchai, Noah Stephens-Davidowitz
papers.abstract: We study the computational problem of ﬁnding a shortest non-zero vector in a rotation of Z n , which we call Z SVP. It has been a long-standing open problem to determine if a polynomial-time algorithm for Z SVP exists, and there is by now a beautiful line of work showing how to solve it eﬃciently in certain very special cases. However, despite all of this work, the fastest known algorithm that is proven to solve Z SVP is still simply the fastest known algorithm for solving SVP (i.e., the problem of ﬁnding shortest non-zero vectors in arbitrary lattices), which runs in 2 n + o ( n ) time. We therefore set aside the (perhaps impossible) goal of ﬁnding an eﬃcient algorithm for Z SVP and instead ask what else we can say about the problem. E.g., can we ﬁnd any non-trivial speedup over the best known SVP algorithm? And, what consequences would follow if Z SVP actually is hard? Our results are as follows. reduction experiments complement and add to those performed by Blanks and Miller, as we work with a larger class of algorithms (i.e., larger block sizes) and study the “provably hard” distribution of bases described above. We also observe a threshold phenomenon in which “basis reduction algorithms on Z n nearly always ﬁnd a shortest non-zero vector once they have found a vector with length less than √ n/ 2,” and we explore this further. Our sieving experiments conﬁrm that heuristic sieving algorithms perform as expected on Z n .
papers.abstract_zh: 我们研究在Z ^ n的旋转中寻找最短非零向量的计算问题，我们称之为Z ^ SVP。确定z-SVP的多项式时间算法是否存在是一个长期存在的公开问题，到目前为止，已经有一系列漂亮的工作显示了如何在某些非常特殊的情况下解决它eﬃciently。然而，尽管做了所有这些工作，被证明求解Z SVP的最快已知算法仍然是求解SVP(即在任意格中寻找最短非零向量的问题)的最快已知算法，其运行时间为2 n + o ( n)。因此，我们把为Z SVP找到eﬃcient算法的目标(也许是不可能的)放在一边，而是问我们还能对这个问题说些什么。例如，我们能在最著名的SVP算法上找到任何非平凡的加速吗？如果Z SVP真的很难，会有什么后果？我们的结果如下。当我们使用更大类的算法(即，更大的块大小)并研究上述“可证明困难的”碱基分布时，归约实验补充并增加了Blanks和Miller所进行的实验。我们还观察到一种阈值现象，其中“Z n上的基归约算法一旦找到长度小于√ n/ 2的向量，几乎总是会找到最短的非零向量”，我们对此进行了进一步探讨。我们的筛选实验证实了启发式筛选算法在Z ^ n上的表现与预期一致。
papers.title_zh: $\mathbb {Z}^n$的轮转到底有多难？最简单格的算法和密码学

papers.title: On Differential Privacy and Adaptive Data Analysis with Bounded Space
papers.authors: Itai Dinur, Uri Stemmer, David P. Woodruff, Samson Zhou
papers.abstract: We study the space complexity of the two related fields of differential privacy and adaptive data analysis. Specifically, (1) Under standard cryptographic assumptions, we show that there exists a problem P that requires exponentially more space to be solved efficiently with differential privacy, compared to the space needed without privacy. To the best of our knowledge, this is the first separation between the space complexity of private and non-private algorithms. (2) The line of work on adaptive data analysis focuses on understanding the number of samples needed for answering a sequence of adaptive queries. We revisit previous lower bounds at a foundational level, and show that they are a consequence of a space bottleneck rather than a sampling bottleneck. To obtain our results, we define and construct an encryption scheme with multiple keys that is built to withstand a limited amount of key leakage in a very particular way.
papers.abstract_zh: 我们研究了差分隐私和自适应数据分析这两个相关领域的空间复杂度。具体地说，(1)在标准的密码假设下，我们证明了存在一个问题P，与没有隐私时所需的空间相比，它需要指数级更多的空间来用差分隐私有效地解决。据我们所知，这是私有和非私有算法的空间复杂度之间的第一次分离。(2)自适应数据分析的工作重点在于理解回答一系列自适应查询所需的样本数量。我们在基础水平上重温以前的下限，并表明它们是空间瓶颈而不是采样瓶颈的结果。为了获得我们的结果，我们定义并构建了一个具有多个密钥的加密方案，该方案被构建为以一种非常特殊的方式来承受有限量的密钥泄漏。
papers.title_zh: 有界空间下的差分隐私和自适应数据分析

papers.title: The Mother of All Leakages: How to Simulate Noisy Leakages via Bounded Leakage (Almost) for Free
papers.authors: Gianluca Brian, Antonio Faonio, Maciej Obremski, João Ribeiro, Mark Simkin, Maciej Skórski, Daniele Venturi
papers.abstract: We show that the most common flavors of noisy leakage can be simulated in the information-theoretic setting using a single query of bounded leakage, up to a small statistical simulation error and a slight loss in the leakage parameter. The latter holds true in particular for one of the most used noisy-leakage models, where the noisiness is measured using the conditional average min-entropy (Naor and Segev, CRYPTO’09 and SICOMP’12). Our reductions between noisy and bounded leakage are achieved in two steps. First, we put forward a new leakage model (dubbed the dense leakage model) and prove that dense leakage can be simulated in the information-theoretic setting using a single query of bounded leakage, up to small statistical distance. Second, we show that the most common noisy-leakage models fall within the class of dense leakage, with good parameters. Third, we prove lower bounds on the amount of bounded leakage required for simulation with sub-constant error, showing that our reductions are nearly optimal. In particular, our results imply that useful general simulation of noisy leakage based on statistical distance and mutual information is impossible. We also provide a complete picture of the relationships between different noisy-leakage models. Our result finds applications to leakage-resilient cryptography, where we are often able to lift security in the presence of bounded leakage to security in the presence of noisy leakage, both in the information-theoretic and in the computational setting. Remarkably, this lifting procedure makes only black-box use of the underlying schemes. Additionally, we show how to use lower bounds in communication complexity to prove that bounded-collusion protocols (Kumar, Meka, and Sahai, FOCS’19) for certain functions do not only require long transcripts, but also necessarily need to reveal enough information about the inputs.
papers.abstract_zh: 我们表明，最常见的噪声泄漏可以在信息论设置中使用有界泄漏的单个查询来模拟，达到小的统计模拟误差和泄漏参数的轻微损失。后者尤其适用于最常用的噪声泄漏模型之一，其中噪声使用条件平均最小熵进行测量(Naor和Segev，CRYPTO'09和SICOMP'12)。我们在噪声泄漏和有界泄漏之间的降低是通过两步实现的。首先，我们提出了一个新的泄漏模型(称为密集泄漏模型),并证明了密集泄漏可以在信息论设置中使用单个有界泄漏查询来模拟，直到小的统计距离。第二，我们表明最常见的噪声泄漏模型属于密集泄漏类，具有良好的参数。第三，我们证明了亚常数误差下模拟所需的有界泄漏量的下界，表明我们的约简几乎是最优的。特别是，我们的结果表明，基于统计距离和互信息的噪声泄漏的有用的一般模拟是不可能的。我们还提供了不同噪声泄漏模型之间关系的完整描述。我们的结果发现了泄漏弹性加密的应用，其中我们通常能够在信息论和计算设置中将存在有界泄漏的安全性提升到存在噪声泄漏的安全性。值得注意的是，这个提升过程只使用了底层方案的黑盒。此外，我们展示了如何使用通信复杂性的下限来证明某些功能的有界共谋协议(Kumar，Meka和Sahai，FOCS'19)不仅需要长抄本，而且还需要揭示关于输入的足够信息。

papers.title: Delay Encryption
papers.authors: Jeffrey Burdges, Luca De Feo
papers.abstract: . Delay Encryption (often called Timed-Release Encryption) is a scheme in which a message is sent into the future by ensuring its conﬁdentiality only for a given amount of time. We propose a new scheme based on a novel time-lock puzzle. This puzzle relies on the assumption that repeated squaring is an inherently sequential process. We perform an extensive and practical analysis of many classical and quantum attacks on our scheme and conclude that it is secure given some precautions.
papers.abstract_zh: 。延迟加密(通常称为定时释放加密)是一种方案，在这种方案中，通过确保消息在给定时间内的机密性，将消息发送到未来。我们提出了一个基于新的时间锁定难题的新方案。这个难题依赖于重复平方是一个固有的顺序过程的假设。我们对许多经典攻击和量子攻击进行了广泛和实际的分析，并得出结论:如果采取一些预防措施，它是安全的。

papers.title: A 2n/2-Time Algorithm for $\sqrt{n}$-SVP and $\sqrt{n}$-Hermite SVP, and an Improved Time-Approximation Tradeoff for (H)SVP
papers.authors: Divesh Aggarwal, Zeyong Li, Noah Stephens-Davidowitz
papers.abstract:
We show a $2^{n/2+o(n)}$-time algorithm that finds a (non-zero) vector in a lattice $\mathcal{L} \subset \mathbb{R}^n$ with norm at most $\tilde{O}(\sqrt{n})\cdot \min\{\lambda_1(\mathcal{L}), \det(\mathcal{L})^{1/n}\}$, where $\lambda_1(\mathcal{L})$ is the length of a shortest non-zero lattice vector and $\det(\mathcal{L})$ is the lattice determinant. Minkowski showed that $\lambda_1(\mathcal{L}) \leq \sqrt{n} \det(\mathcal{L})^{1/n}$ and that there exist lattices with $\lambda_1(\mathcal{L}) \geq \Omega(\sqrt{n}) \cdot \det(\mathcal{L})^{1/n}$, so that our algorithm finds vectors that are as short as possible relative to the determinant (up to a polylogarithmic factor). 
The main technical contribution behind this result is new analysis of (a simpler variant of) an algorithm from arXiv:1412.7994, which was only previously known to solve less useful problems. To achieve this, we rely crucially on the ``reverse Minkowski theorem'' (conjectured by Dadush arXiv:1606.06913 and proven by arXiv:1611.05979), which can be thought of as a partial converse to the fact that $\lambda_1(\mathcal{L}) \leq \sqrt{n} \det(\mathcal{L})^{1/n}$. 
Previously, the fastest known algorithm for finding such a vector was the $2^{.802n + o(n)}$-time algorithm due to [Liu, Wang, Xu, and Zheng, 2011], which actually found a non-zero lattice vector with length $O(1) \cdot \lambda_1(\mathcal{L})$. Though we do not show how to find lattice vectors with this length in time $2^{n/2+o(n)}$, we do show that our algorithm suffices for the most important application of such algorithms: basis reduction. In particular, we show a modified version of Gama and Nguyen's slide-reduction algorithm [Gama and Nguyen, STOC 2008], which can be combined with the algorithm above to improve the time-length tradeoff for shortest-vector algorithms in nearly all regimes, including the regimes relevant to cryptography.
papers.abstract_zh:
我们展示了一个$2^{n/2+o(n)}$-time算法，该算法在格$ \ mathcal { l } \子集\mathbb{R}^n$中寻找一个(非零)向量，其中范数至多为$ \ tilde { o }(\ sqrt { n })\ cdot \ min \ { \ lambda _ 1(\ mathcal { l })，\det(\mathcal{L})^{1/n}\}$，其中$\lambda_1(\mathcal{L})$是最短非零格向量的长度，而$\det(\mathcal{L})$是格行列式。Minkowski证明了＄\ lambda _ 1(\ mathcal { l })\ leq \ sqrt { n } \det(\mathcal{l})^{1/n}$，并且存在具有＄\ lambda _ 1(\ mathcal { l })\ geq \ omega(\ sqrt { n })\ cdot \det(\mathcal{l})^{1/n}$的格，因此我们的算法找到了相对于行列式尽可能短的向量(直到多对数因子)。
这一结果背后的主要技术贡献是对来自arXiv:1412.7994的算法(的一个更简单的变体)的新分析，该算法以前只知道解决不太有用的问题。为了实现这一点，我们主要依赖于“反向闵可夫斯基定理”(由达杜什·arXiv推测:1606.06913，并由arxiv证明:1611.05979)，该定理可以被认为是＄\ lambda _ 1(\ mathcal { l })\ leq \ sqrt { n } \det(\mathcal{l})^{1/n}$.
此前，已知的寻找这种向量的最快算法是+ o(n)}$-time算法，这是由于[刘，王，徐，郑，2011]，该算法实际上找到了长度为$ o(1)\ cdot \ lambda _ 1(\ mathcal { l })$。虽然我们没有展示如何在时间$2^{n/2+o(n)}$中找到具有这种长度的格向量，但是我们展示了我们的算法足以满足这种算法的最重要的应用:基归约。特别是，我们展示了Gama和Nguyen的滑动缩减算法的修改版本[Gama和Nguyen，STOC，2008年]，它可以与上述算法结合，以改善几乎所有制度下最短向量算法的时间长度权衡，包括与密码学相关的制度。

papers.title: Watermarking PRFs Against Quantum Adversaries
papers.authors: Fuyuki Kitagawa, Ryo Nishimaki
papers.abstract: Weinitiatethestudyofsoftwarewatermarkingagainstquantumadversaries. Aquantumadversary generates a quantum state as a pirate software that potentially removes an embedded message from a classical markedsoftware. Extractingan embeddedmessage from quantumpirate software is diﬃcult since measurement could irreversibly alter the quantum state. In software watermarking against classical adversaries, a message extraction algorithm crucially uses the (input-output) behavior of a classical pirate software to extract an embedded message. Even if we instantiate existing watermarking PRFs with quantum-safe building blocks, it is not clear whether they are secure against quantum adversaries due to the quantum-speciﬁc property above. Thus, we need entirely new techniques to achieve software watermarking against quantum adversaries. In this work, we deﬁne secure watermarking PRFs for quantum adversaries (unremovability against quantum adversaries). We also present two watermarking PRFs as follows. have the extraction key (and the public parameter). We develop a quantum extraction technique to extract information (a classical string) from a quantum state without destroying the state too much. We also introduce the notion of extraction-less watermarking PRFs as a crucial building block to achieve the results above by combining the tool with our quantum extraction technique.
papers.abstract_zh: 我们发起了对软件水印的研究。Aquantumadversary生成一个量子态作为盗版软件，它可能会从经典的标记软件中删除嵌入的消息。从量子软件中提取嵌入信息是diﬃcult，因为测量可以不可逆地改变量子状态。在针对传统对手的软件水印中，消息提取算法关键地使用传统盗版软件的(输入-输出)行为来提取嵌入的消息。即使我们用量子安全的构建模块实例化现有的水印PRF，也不清楚它们是否能够安全地抵御量子敌人，因为上面的量子特性。因此，我们需要全新的技术来实现对抗量子对手的软件水印。在这项工作中，我们定义了针对量子对手的安全水印PRF(针对量子对手的不可移动性)。我们还提出了如下两个水印PRF。拥有提取密钥(和公共参数)。我们开发了一种量子提取技术，在不破坏量子态太多的情况下，从量子态中提取信息(经典字符串)。我们还引入了无提取水印PRFs的概念，作为通过将该工具与我们的量子提取技术相结合来实现上述结果的关键构建块。

papers.title: Guaranteed Output in $O(\sqrt{n})$ Rounds for Round-Robin Sampling Protocols
papers.authors: Ran Cohen, Jack Doerner, Yashvanth Kondi, Abhi Shelat
papers.abstract: We introduce a notion of round-robin secure sampling that captures several protocols in the literature, such as the “powers-of-tau” setup protocol for pairing-based polynomial commitments and zk-SNARKs, and certain veriﬁable mixnets. Due to their round-robin structure, protocols of this class inherently require n sequential broadcast rounds, where n is the number of participants. We describe how to compile them generically into protocols that require only O ( √ n ) broadcast rounds. Our compiled protocols guarantee output delivery against any dishonest majority. This stands in contrast to prior techniques, which require Ω( n ) sequential broadcasts in most cases (and sometimes many more). Our compiled protocols permit a certain amount of adversarial bias in the output, as all sampling protocols with guaranteed output must, due to Cleve’s impossibility result (STOC’86). We show that in the context of the aforementioned applications, this bias is harmless.
papers.abstract_zh: 我们引入了循环安全采样的概念，它可以捕获文献中的几种协议，例如基于配对的多项式承诺和zk-SNARKs的“tau幂”设置协议，以及某些可验证的混合网络。由于其循环结构，这类协议本质上需要n轮连续的广播，其中n是参与者的数量。我们描述了如何将它们编译成只需要O ( √ n)轮广播的协议。我们编制的协议保证了输出交付不受任何不诚实多数的影响。这与现有技术形成对比，现有技术在大多数情况下需要ω(n)顺序广播(有时甚至更多)。由于克里夫的不可能结果(STOC'86)，我们编译的协议允许输出中有一定量的对抗性偏差，因为所有保证输出的采样协议都必须这样。我们表明，在上述应用的背景下，这种偏见是无害的。
papers.title_zh: 循环采样协议的$O(\sqrt{n})$ Rounds保证输出

papers.title: Two-Round Multiparty Secure Computation from Minimal Assumptions
papers.authors: Sanjam Garg, Akshayaram Srinivasan
papers.abstract: We provide new two-round multiparty secure computation (MPC) protocols in the dishonest majority setting assuming the minimal assumption that two-round oblivious transfer (OT) exists. If the assumed two-round OT protocol is secure against semi-honest adversaries (in the plain model) then so is our two-round MPC protocol. Similarly, if the assumed two-round OT protocol is secure against malicious adversaries (in the common random/reference string model) then so is our two-round MPC protocol. Previously, two-round MPC protocols were only known under relatively stronger computational assumptions.
papers.abstract_zh: 我们提出了新的两轮多方安全计算(MPC)协议，在不诚实多数环境下，假设存在两轮不经意传输(OT)。如果假设的两轮OT协议对于半诚实的对手是安全的(在简单模型中),那么我们的两轮MPC协议也是安全的。类似地，如果假设的两轮OT协议对恶意对手是安全的(在公共随机/参考字符串模型中)，那么我们的两轮MPC协议也是安全的。以前，两轮MPC协议仅在相对更强的计算假设下是已知的。
papers.title_zh: 基于最小假设的两轮多方安全计算

papers.title: Faster Gaussian Sampling for Trapdoor Lattices with Arbitrary Modulus
papers.authors: Nicholas Genise, Daniele Micciancio
papers.abstract: We present improved algorithms for gaussian preimage sampling using the lattice trapdoors of (Micciancio and Peikert, CRYPTO 2012). The MP12 work only offered a highly optimized algorithm for the on-line stage of the computation in the special case when the lattice modulus q is a power of two. For arbitrary modulus q, the MP12 preimage sampling procedure resorted to general lattice algorithms with complexity cubic in the bitsize of the modulus (or quadratic, but with substantial preprocessing and storage overheads.) Our new preimage sampling algorithm (for any modulus q) achieves linear complexity, and has very modest storage requirements. As an additional contribution, we give a new off-line quasi-linear time perturbation sampling algorithm, with performance similar to the (expected) running time of an efficient method proposed by (Ducas and Nguyen, Asiacrypt 2012) for power-of-two cyclotomics, but without the (matrix factorization) preprocessing and (lattice rounding) postprocessing required by that algorithm. All our algorithms are fairly simple, with small hidden constants, and offer a practical alternative to use the MP12 trapdoor lattices in a broad range of cryptographic applications.
papers.abstract_zh: 我们提出了使用(Micciancio和Peikert，CRYPTO 2012)的点阵陷门进行高斯原像采样的改进算法。MP12的工作只是在格模数q是2的幂的特殊情况下，为计算的在线阶段提供了高度优化的算法。对于任意的模数q，MP12原像采样过程求助于一般的点阵算法，其复杂度是模数的比特大小的三次方(或二次方),但是具有大量的预处理和存储开销。)我们的新的原像采样算法(对于任何模数q)实现了线性复杂度，并且具有非常适中的存储需求。作为一个额外的贡献，我们给出了一个新的离线准线性时间扰动采样算法，其性能类似于(Ducas和Nguyen，Asiacrypt 2012)为2的幂的切圆术提出的有效方法的(预期)运行时间，但没有该算法所需的(矩阵分解)预处理和(网格舍入)后处理。我们所有的算法都相当简单，具有很小的隐藏常数，并且为在广泛的密码应用中使用MP12陷门格提供了一种实用的替代方案。

papers.title: Improving the Linear Programming Technique in the Search for Lower Bounds in Secret Sharing
papers.authors: Oriol Farràs, Tarik Kaced, Sebastià Martín Molleví, Carles Padró
papers.abstract: We present a new improvement in the linear programming technique to derive lower bounds on the information ratio of secret sharing schemes. We obtain non-Shannon-type bounds without using information inequalities explicitly. Our new technique makes it possible to determine the optimal information ratio of linear secret sharing schemes for all access structures on 5 participants and all graph-based access structures on 6 participants. In addition, new lower bounds are presented also for some small matroid ports and, in particular, the optimal information ratios of the linear secret sharing schemes for the ports of the Vamos matroid are determined.
papers.abstract_zh: 我们对线性规划技术提出了一个新的改进，来推导秘密共享方案的信息比的下界。我们得到了非Shannon型界，而没有明确使用信息不等式。我们的新技术使得确定5个参与者的所有访问结构和6个参与者的所有基于图的访问结构的线性秘密共享方案的最优信息比成为可能。此外，对一些小拟阵端口给出了新的下界，特别地，确定了Vamos拟阵端口的线性秘密共享方案的最佳信息比。

papers.title: Function Secret Sharing
papers.authors: Elette Boyle, Niv Gilboa, Yuval Ishai
papers.abstract: Applications today rely on cloud databases for storing and querying time-series data. While outsourcing storage is convenient, this data is often sensitive, making data breaches a serious concern. We present Waldo, a time-series database with rich functionality and strong security guarantees: Waldo supports multi-predicate filtering, protects data contents as well as query filter values and search access patterns, and provides malicious security in the 3-party honest-majority setting. In contrast, prior systems such as Timecrypt and Zeph have limited functionality and security: (1) these systems can only filter on time, and (2) they reveal the queried time interval to the server. Oblivious RAM (ORAM) and generic multiparty computation (MPC) are natural choices for eliminating leakage from prior work, but both of these are prohibitively expensive in our setting due to the number of roundtrips and bandwidth overhead, respectively. To minimize both, Waldo builds on top of function secret sharing, enabling Waldo to evaluate predicates non-interactively. We develop new techniques for applying function secret sharing to the encrypted database setting where there are malicious servers, secret inputs, and chained predicates. With 32-core machines, Waldo runs a query with 8 range predicates over 218 records in 3.03s, compared to 12.88s or an MPC baseline and 16.56s for an ORAM baseline. Compared to Waldo, the MPC baseline uses $9-82 \times$ more bandwidth between servers (for different numbers of records), while the ORAM baseline uses $20-152 \times$ more bandwidth between the client and server(s) (for different numbers of predicates).
papers.abstract_zh: 当今的应用程序依靠云数据库来存储和查询时间序列数据。 尽管外包存储很方便，但这些数据通常很敏感，这使数据泄露成为严重的问题。 我们提出Waldo，这是一个具有丰富功能和强大安全性的时间序列数据库：Waldo支持多策划过滤，保护数据内容以及查询过滤器值和搜索访问模式，并在三方诚实的Majority中提供恶意安全性 环境。 相比之下，诸如时代和Zeph之类的先前系统的功能和安全性有限：（1）这些系统只能按时过滤，并且（2）它们向服务器揭示了查询时间间隔。 Obsovious RAM（ORAM）和通用多方计算（MPC）是消除先前工作泄漏的自然选择，但是由于往返往返和带宽的数量，这两者在我们的环境中都非常昂贵。 为了最大程度地减少两者，Waldo建立在功能秘密共享之上，使Waldo能够非相互互动评估。 我们开发了将功能秘密共享应用于加密数据库设置的新技术，其中有恶意服务器，秘密输入和链式谓词。 Waldo拥有32核机器，在3.03s的218个记录中运行了一个查询，而12.88s或MPC基线和16.56s的查询则为Oram基线。 与Waldo相比，MPC基线在服务器之间使用$ 9-82 \ times $ $带宽（对于不同的记录），而Oram基线使用$ 20-152 \ times $ $ $ $ $ $ $ 20-152 \ times $在客户端和服务器之间（用于不同的带宽） 谓词的数量）。

papers.title: Cryptographic Reverse Firewalls
papers.authors: Ilya Mironov, Noah Stephens-Davidowitz
papers.abstract: In order to protect data privacy in cloud storage, sensitive data is encrypted before being uploaded to a cloud server. How to retrieve ciphertext safely and effectively has become a problem. Public key encryption with keyword search (PEKS) realizes the retrieval of ciphertexts in clouds without disclosing secret information. However, most PEKS protocols can not resist an keyword guessing attack (KGA) launched by untrusted cloud servers. Meanwhile, these protocols are unable to detect vulnerabilities, resulting in information leakage. In this article, we design a searchable public-key encryption with cryptographic reverse firewalls (SPKE-CRF), and use the JPBC library to implement the protocol. Security analysis shows that the SPKE-CRF protocol can resist a chosen keyword attack (CKA), a KGA, and an algorithm substitution attack (ASA) without secure channels. Performance analysis shows that the SPKE-CRF protocol has a significant communication and computational cost advantage while being resistant to the KGA and ASA from malicious insider attackers in cloud environments. Therefore, our SPKE-CRF protocol is secure and efficient for cloud storage.
papers.abstract_zh: 为了保护云存储中的数据隐私，敏感数据在上传到云服务器之前会被加密。如何安全有效地检索密文成为了一个问题。带有关键字搜索的公钥加密(PEKS)实现了在不泄露秘密信息的情况下在云端检索密文。然而，大多数PEKS协议不能抵抗由不可信云服务器发起的关键字猜测攻击(KGA)。同时，这些协议无法检测漏洞，导致信息泄露。在这篇文章中，我们设计了一个带有密码反向防火墙的可搜索公钥加密协议(SPKE-CRF ),并使用JPBC库来实现该协议。安全性分析表明，SPKE-CRF协议可以抵抗无安全通道的选择关键字攻击(CKA)、KGA和算法替换攻击(ASA)。性能分析表明，SPKE-CRF协议在抵抗云环境中恶意内部攻击者的KGA和as a的同时，具有显著的通信和计算成本优势。因此，我们的SPKE-CRF协议对于云存储是安全高效的。
papers.title_zh: 加密反向防火墙

papers.title: Adaptive Partitioning
papers.authors: Dennis Hofheinz
papers.abstract: Multi-Robot Systems have been recently employed in different applications and have advantages over single-robot systems, such as increased robustness and task performance efficiency. We consider such assemblies specifically in the scenario of perimeter defense, where the task is to defend a circular perimeter by intercepting radially approaching targets. Possible intruders appear randomly at a fixed distance from the perimeter and with azimuthal location determined by some unknown probability density. Coordination among multiple defenders is a complex combinatorial optimization problem. In this work, we focus on the following two aspects: (i) estimating the probability density that describes the direction from which the next intruders are going to arrive, and (ii) partitioning of the space so that the defenders focus on capturing a disjoint subset of intruders. Results show that the proposed strategy increases the number of captures over a naive baseline strategy, especially in scenarios with non-uniform spatial distributions of intruder arrival. The proposed approach is also efficient and able to quickly adapt to time-varying intruder distributions.
papers.abstract_zh: 最近，多机器人系统已经在不同的应用中得到应用，并且具有优于单机器人系统的优点，例如增加的鲁棒性和任务执行效率。我们认为这种装置特别适用于周边防御，其任务是通过拦截径向接近的目标来防御环形周边。可能的入侵者随机出现在离周界固定距离的地方，方位位置由一些未知的概率密度决定。多个防御者之间的协调是一个复杂的组合优化问题。在这项工作中，我们集中在以下两个方面:(I)估计描述下一个入侵者将要到达的方向的概率密度，以及(ii)划分空间，以便防御者专注于捕获入侵者的不相交子集。结果表明，与简单的基线策略相比，所提出的策略增加了捕获的数量，尤其是在入侵者到达的空间分布不均匀的情况下。所提出的方法也是有效的，并且能够快速适应时变的入侵者分布。
